Text: Any chance of getting a full BD rip?
Its a decent copy, the opening act is very grainy like they didn't even try to restore it. The rest is okay but I really don't see how this is any better than the prior 1080p release.
Well this was meant to be remastered from 4k but downmixed to 1080p. I was also hoping to get a larger file size, but will see what this looks like. Thnx for 1080p version though DownTYU.
